entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries ending this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
